attributes.action: End the 12 Month Deferral Ban on Gay Men Donating Blood
attributes.background:
The discriminatory ban on homosexual men giving blood has no place in an equal society.

We, the undersigned, call on the Government to end the 12 month deferral ban on gay men donating blood, and replace it with an individual risk assessment based process for all blood donors.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/106555 

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
